text: Thiviers () is a commune in the Dordogne department in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in southwestern France. ==Population== ==Personalities== It is notable as being the town in which Jean-Paul Sartre lived as a child. Painter Pierre Bouillon was born there. ==Geography== The Côle forms part of the commune's northwestern border. ==See also== *Château de Vaucocour *Communes of the Dordogne department ==References== *INSEE Category:Communes of Dordogne
title: Thiviers
